channel.title: Help on Suntimes
channel.description: Recent content in Help on Suntimes

item.title: Actions
item.description: Suntimes can perform user-defined actions when a widget is clicked, or when an alarm or notification is shown or dismissed. Add Actions

item.title: Alarms
item.description: Suntimes Alarms is an alarm clock with support for daily repeating alarms and notifications. Battery Optimization Notification Settings

item.title: Data Sources
item.description: Suntimes uses third-party libraries to perform astronomical calculations. The data source settings allow for choosing between different libraries (or choosing between different algorithms offered by those libraries). These are advanced settings that affect the speed and accuracy of calculations, and may limit which features are available. Available Data Sources Adding Data Sources

item.title: Data Substitutions
item.description: Suntimes supports limited %substitutions, a set of tags that are replaced with values from the data set. Substitutions may be used within widget titles, alarm notes, or within action data or extras. Available Substitions Examples

item.title: Worldmap
item.description: Set Background Suntimes can be configured to display a custom world map background. Download Backgrounds Creating Backgrounds Use : -> Center -> Set Background to change the map’s background image. Play Suntimes is able to animate the world map at different rates. 15m; frames are 15 minutes apart. 1d; frames are 24 hours apart. Press and to step through map frames one at a time. Press to start the animation, to stop it, and to reset to the current moment.
